node.text:
⁣
The all terrain resort razor ideal for high performance all-mountain charging and carving. ⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣"We are super excited about the new evolution of the Aviator 2.0. We like to look at this board like a full peak to park resort razor. If you want to ride the whole mountain but still cruise into the park and be able to handle jumps and transitions with speed and power then this is the board for you." - @jeremyjones⁣
⁣
The 2021 Aviator 2.0 is a limited edition model available only at select Jones dealers. These exclusive editions offer inspired riders the chance to try cutting edge designs before the masses, and they support the shops that have had our back since day one and do so much for our mountain communities. In the face of the global pandemic, core shops need our support more than ever.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
LINK IN BIO. ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
🎥: @gregweavervideo ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣
#jonesaviator ⁣

node.text:
⁣
The slicing and dicing speed arrow. Ideal for high speed slashing in any condition.⁣
⁣
"This board is built for speed. It’s a fall line charger that effortlessly swallows up vertical feet. Don’t be scared though, the 3D Contour Base makes for quick edge- to-edge transitions allowing you to maneuver through tight trees with ease. Sizing will determine how much you want to bite off. Go for the 158 for the more nimble experience, or step up to the 162 to draw the biggest lines of your life." – @jeremyjones ⁣
⁣
The 2021 Storm Wolf is a limited edition model available only at select Jones dealers. These exclusive editions offer inspired riders the chance to try cutting edge designs before the masses, and they support the shops that have had our back since day one and do so much for our mountain communities. In the face of the global pandemic, core shops need our support more than ever.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
A Splitboarders journey through the ever changing snow and light conditions of the Arctic Circle. 

“ I’ve been working for the past few years a lot with Iisakki Kennilä and we’ve been both wanting to create a short film that has been fully filmed in Arctic Circle. An area where we live. In our previous films Closer and Yukiguni we took viewer for the ride. In ROAM we are planning to take it also to the mind of the viewer and that is where sound designer Eero Nieminen plays a huge role.” - @anttiautti 

In Roam, viewer will experience of what it is to splitboard through the changing snow and light seasons of Arctic mountains and fells. The Northern weather can be harsh and the hills brutal, but with the right mindset, they give you more than you could ever ask for. 

In autumn 2021 comes a short film that gets you to a ride in the mind of a tireless lonely rider and will definitely get you hyped for those splitboarding adventures.

Cinematography: @iisakkikennila 
Sound:  @ekixonite 

#roamsnow #jonesstormchaser

node.text:
A Chamonix High Mountain Guide story.⁣
⁣
Let's cultivate our garden. This is where Jones Ambassador Guide @picaherry takes us; in his own garden. Born in Chamonix Mont-Blanc, this is where he developed his style and technique. The mountain flows through his veins. A discreet performer, he practices mountaineering and snowboarding as few have done before him. A high mountain guide and a lover of powder snow, his specialty is steep riding. With this portrait discovered in "Earn Your Turn", the story of a simple man who finds his fulfillment in sharing and humility. Across the mountains around the world, Pica has dragged his board preaching respect for nature and a love of discovery. At home, his family, friends and clients tell us about his commitment and describe what makes this man an example to follow. In this film produced by @invade_media , dive into the heart of the Mont-Blanc massif and relive the best moments of the career of a guide who deserves to be talked about. ⁣
⁣
Full film coming December 15th. ⁣
⁣
#jonesmountaintwin

node.text:
⁣
A full look at Elena Hight's new movie⁣
 "Blank Canvas" featuring Jones riders @nick_russelll @sammy_luebke @jeremyjones and friends. ⁣
⁣
Blank Canvas is a short film by @tetongravity that celebrates the conscious choice to follow your heart. So often in life we find ourselves forging forward focused on our goals, until a chance experience opens our eyes and hearts to a new world of possibilities. But the decision to leave unfulfilled goals behind to explore the unknown is always a risk. What does it look like to break free from what is comfortable and secure? ⁣
⁣
Dropping December 2020⁣
⁣
#tgrblankcanvas #joneswomens #jonessolution

node.text:
⁣
⁣
Freestyle meets Freeride - Ideal for slashing, jibbing and jumping.⁣
⁣
@jeremyjones breaks down the all new 2021 Twin Collection. ⁣
⁣
The Focused Freeride Twin. The Mountain Twin is a versatile directional twin designed for playful shredders who want one board that can ride-it-all.⁣
⁣
The Mountain Twin was one of the four original models in our debut 2010 board collection. Now eleven winters later, the Mountain Twin is still one of the foundations of our line and one of our best selling models. Why? Because it’s our most versatile shape and it’s super fun to ride anywhere on the mountain. If you like to mix up your runs between chutes, trees and the terrain park, the Mountain Twin and the Twin series are designed for you. All four Twin series models are built to offer amazing freestyle and freeride performance in any snow condition.⁣
⁣
For 2021 we’re stoked to present an all-new Twin series featuring a 3D Contour Base and a unique new directional twin shape. To re-invent these classic models we re-designed every millimeter of the shape and profile.⁣
⁣
For more info on the Twin Collection hit the LINK IN BIO. ⁣
⁣
#jonesmountaintwin #jonesultramountaintwin #jonestwinsister

node.title: 2021 - Mountain Twin, Split, Ultra Mountain Twin & Twin Sister

node.text:
⁣
⁣
What unites us as American's is far greater than what divides us. ⁣
⁣
@jeremyjones recently meet up with @cbsthismorning to talk about his new movie "Purple Mountains" and how he is trying to bring people together over their love for the outdoors to find common ground to help protect the planet. ⁣
⁣
#stokethevote #purplemountainsfilm ⁣
#outdoorstate
⁣
________________________________⁣
"Professional snowboarder @JeremyJones wants harness Americans' love for the outdoors, to find common ground and protect the planet. @JonVigliotti introduces us to the world-famous athlete and found of @protectourwinters who has now become a global activist. "

node.title: Finding common ground to Protect the Planet.

node.text:
⁣
⁣
The ultimate all-terrain splitboard - Ideal for backcountry freeriding and wilderness exploration⁣
⁣
The Solution is the ultimate all-terrain splitboard and delivers unrivaled backcountry performance in any snow condition.⁣
⁣
Featuring a directional freeride shape, directional rocker profile and a mid-stiff flex, the Solution is playful in soft snow, yet confidence inspiring on steep, hard snow. We’ve completely redesigned the Solution’s shape for 2021 by adding more taper and a 3D Contour Base 3.0. The tapered shape sinks the tail in pow for better float and the 3D Contour Base makes every turn more fluid and effortless. For added response the Solution is built with our premium Ultra core, Flax/Basalt Power stringers and an ECO-plastic topsheet. The Solution also features the Boltless Bridge plus @karakorambc Ultra Clips and Tip-Lock Tip Clips for unmatched torsional board lock and Inner/Outer Traction Tech 3.0 for added edge grip going up or down.⁣
⁣
Hit the link in our bio to learn more about the all the SOLUTION. ⁣
⁣
🎥: @gregweavervideo ⁣
⁣
#jonessolution #jonesultrasolution #joneswomens

node.text:
⁣⁣
⁣
" Purple Mountains is a film about my journey to understand why we are so divided as a country on climate change.  It is certainly the most brain flexing film I have done. Not since my first footpowered film #jjonesdeeper have I been so out of my comfort zone." - @jeremyjones ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Motivated by an urge to protect the places he loves, Jeremy set out on a physical and philosophical journey to find common ground with fellow outdoor people across diverse political backgrounds. He learns their hopes and fears while walking a mile in their shoes on the mountain and in the snow.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Be sure to tune into the virtual premiere of Jeremy's brand new film on September 16 at 6 PM MST. @protectourwinters will be hosting a live Q&A with Jeremy and director @joshbonesmurphy following the film.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
There are limited spots available for the premiere screening, so be sure to sign up today via the link in our bio! We hope to see you there! ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
@tetongravity #PurpleMountains #MakeADamnPlan

node.text:
⁣⁣
⁣
“ A brief POV recap of a new (to my knowledge?) line off the North Summit of Denali ( 19,470ft) and also likely the hardest line of my life thus far. It was the final day of our #denalssurfteam expedition; the previous day we rode the Orient, and two days before the Messner. We were totally smoked. Weather was moving in and it seemed like our final chance at riding the mythical Black Rock Peak. The entry was a completely sketch chossy downclimb/navigation before the line opened up. At the apron it linked up with @forrestshearer ‘s line. Amazing way to end the trip of a lifetime. “ - @nick_russelll ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Be sure to check out the full film “The Big One” by @roam from this epic adventure. Link in BIO. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
#jonescarbonsolution #DST

node.title: Nick Russell Snowboarding North Summit of Denali

node.text:
Always ➡️ a good ride on the Mind Expander Twin. 

@instagarry can confirm. 

The new Mind Expander Twin is a hybrid Surf Series model that blends the playful, easy going board feel of the Mind Expander with the freestyle performance of a directional twin shape.

This year the Mind Expander Twin will be fully available in store and online in a 154 & 158. 

📷: @andrew_miller 

#jonessurfseries #jonesmindexpandertwin #jonesbindings

node.text:
A look at the full SOLID ➡️ BOARD line up for 2022. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
27 models in all, we added some new sizes, shapes and upgrades to the entire line. Alittle something for everybody! ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Excited to announce the 2022 Jones product collection is now live. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Discover the whole range on the Jones website now.⁣⁣

Be sure to check out our GEAR 101 page for a  helping guide to finding your perfect board, shape and size. Or let us know if you have any questions below! 
⁣⁣
LINK IN BIO.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
#odetoprogression #jonessnowboards #joneswomens #jonesgromsquad

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Jones Snowboards on September 14, 2021 tagging @robinvangyn. May be an image of 1 person and snow.

node.text:
🚨IT’S OFFICIAL🚨⁣
⁣
We are beyond stoked to welcome @robinvangyn to the Jones family! ⁣

We have been a fans for a long time and couldn’t be more honored to have Robin join as the latest addition to the Jones pro team. Robin is the 2021 @naturalselection tour champion and has helped set the standard for women’s freeride snowboarding both in films and as a guide for over a decade. Beyond her talents on snow, Robin is a true ambassador of the sport and loves to share her passion for snowboarding with others. 

Learn all about Robin and her latest projects in a new interview on the Jones Journal.

Welcome Robin! 🙌🏻

LINK IN BIO. 

📷: @andrew_miller 

#joneswomens #jonesstratos #jonesbindings

node.text:
@victordelerue enjoying some deep cuts in Jackson on his Aviator 2.0. 

This completely re-designed Aviator is a hard charging direction twin built for expert all-mountain riders who like to rail turns and stomp airs anywhere on the mountain. 

This year the Aviator 2.0 will be fully available in store and online with a wider range of sizes: 154, 158, 159W & 162. 

📷: @andrew_miller 

#jonesaviator2.0 #jonesbindings #jonesapollo

node.text:
“When it comes to snowboards I’m a one horse cowboy kinda guy. “ - @sammy_luebke 

That one horse being the Ultra Mountain Twin.  Sammy has been the driving force behind the UMT since it came out six years ago relying on it to handle anything and everything he throws at it. 

Be sure to check out the newest episode of BOARD HOARDERS where Sammy walks you through his quiver and what boards he rides and why. 

LINK IN BIO.

🎥: @timanning 

#jonesboardhoarders #jonesultramountaintwin

node.text:
BOARD HOARDERS: Sammy Luebke. 

Check out Sammy's snowboard quiver.
 
The BOARD HOARDERS video series features Jones’ team riders digging into their personal snowboard collections and sharing stories about their favorite boards. In part 5 of the series, @sammy_luebke shows us his quiver including the board he won his first Freeride World Tour championship on and his favorite splitboard. Watch the new episode now on the Jones YouTube channel.

LINK IN BIO. 

🎥: @gregweavervideo 

#jonesultramountaintwin #jonestratos #jonessolution
